verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARGM-TMP: currently] [ARG2: at an important summit in Singapore] , [ARGM-ADV: attempting to talk about nuclear negotiations with North Korean Dictator Kim Jong - Un] .
